name: Firefox: Minimalistic Floating Scrollbars
description: Experimental. Simple variation of 'semi transparent scrollbar above content' seen in Responsive Mode in past Nightlies. Probably will mess things up: select boxes, textareas to name some. Restart Firefox after installation.
additional_info: Works nice otherwise FWIW. Notes: Paul Roget's gist style 76999 Bug 799471: [responsive mode] floating scrollbars slow down responsive mode startup. Make it optin.
